sn11.5:1.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakkam devanamindam etadavoca:
sn11.5:1.6: Atha kho, bhikkhave, deva ca asura ca parisajje thapesum:
sn11.5:1.8: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakkam devanamindam etadavoca:
sn11.5:1.10: Evam vutte, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo vepacittim asurindam etadavoca:
sn11.5:1.13: Evam vutte, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo imam gatham abhasi:
sn11.5:3.1: Bhasitaya kho pana, bhikkhave, vepacittina asurindena gathaya asura anumodimsu, deva tunhi ahesum.
sn11.5:3.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakkam devanamindam etadavoca:
sn11.5:3.4: Evam vutte, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo imam gatham abhasi:
sn11.5:5.1: Bhasitaya kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkena devanamindena gathaya, deva anumodimsu, asura tunhi ahesum.
sn11.5:5.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo vepacittim asurindam etadavoca:
sn11.5:5.4: Evam vutte, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo imam gatham abhasi:
sn11.5:7.1: Bhasitaya kho pana, bhikkhave, vepacittina asurindena gathaya asura anumodimsu, deva tunhi ahesum.
sn11.5:7.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakkam devanamindam etadavoca:
sn11.5:7.4: Evam vutte, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo ima gathayo abhasi:
sn11.5:14.1: Bhasitasu kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkena devanamindena gathasu, deva anumodimsu, asura tunhi ahesum.
sn11.5:14.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, devananca asurananca parisajja etadavocum:
sn11.5:14.4: Ta ca kho sadandavacara sasatthavacara, iti bhandanam iti viggaho iti kalaho.
sn11.5:14.6: Ta ca kho adandavacara asatthavacara, iti abhandanam iti aviggaho iti akalaho.
sn11.5:14.8: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sakkassa devanamindassa subhasitena jayo ahosi”ti.
